desc: Welcome to the newbie zone, where you'll learn how to play! First thing's first, type `help` to see all the commands available to you.  Once you've done that, go ahead and move to the room north of here.

roomTitle: Newbie Zone: The Road to Discovery
desc: Glad you made it! Remember that `help` command from the last room? Well it has more uses too! You can do `help command_name` to get more information about any command. Go ahead and try that with `help take`. Once you've done that, try to take the axe from the ground and then head east.

roomTitle: Newbie Zone: Skilling and Action Repetition
desc: If you take a `look` you'll notice there's a tree here. Go ahead and try to `chop tree`. Notice how you only chopped once? This is where action repetition comes into play. Now try `#5 chop tree`. Boom! See, you repeated that action several times. This concludes the basics of skilling and action repetition.
